TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByHeaders extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种类型安全的方式来设置 属性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识 ASP.NET 用于唯一标识的响应变体，当有多个缓存的响应的资源时的请求标头参数。The property identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response when there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 当响应依赖于一组客户端输入，例如标头或参数时，这非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers or parameters. HTTP 缓存控制标头，不直接相关，但有助于确保客户端或代理因指定的标头。The is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers, but helps ensure that a client or proxy varies by the specified headers. 有关详细信息`VaryByHeaders`，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about `VaryByHeaders`, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptTypes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 HTTP 标头而改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the HTTP header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而改变时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器而改变响应的请求标头字段`Accept`字段，并指定服务器选择基于客户端可接受的媒体类型的响应。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by the `Accept` field and specifies that the server selects the response based on the media types acceptable to the client. HTTP 标头的详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTTP headers, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。This following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.AcceptTypes Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取指定用于改变缓存的 HTTP 标头的值数组。

span.span: Gets an array of values which specify the HTTP headers to be used for varying the cache.

returns.span: 包含用于改变缓存的 HTTP 标头的值数组。

span.span: An array of values which contain the HTTP headers for varying the cache.

span.span: The name of the custom header.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义标头字段，ASP.NET 输出缓存将随该字段改变缓存的响应，并将其追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom header field that the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当因指定的自定义字段; 而异 ASP.NET 输出缓存否则为。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the specified custom field; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器而改变响应的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server varies the response by. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 如果内部调用方法指定`header`具有值 \* （星号）。The method is called internally if the specified `header` has the value \* (an asterisk).

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserAgent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header, and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器用来确定对客户端请求响应中发送的其中多个缓存响应的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `User-Agent`字段指定服务器选择基于客户端的用户代理类型的响应。The `User-Agent` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's user-agent type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserAgent Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserCharSet { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the ASP.NET output cache varies by the header and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器用来确定对客户端请求响应中发送的其中多个缓存响应的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-CharSet`字段指定服务器选择基于客户端的字符集的响应。The `Accept-CharSet` field specifies that the server selects the response based on the client's character set. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserCharSet Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UserLanguage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 ASP.NET 输出缓存是否随 标头改变缓存的响应，并将该标头追加到传出的 HTTP 标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ASP.NET output cache varies the cached responses by the header, and appends it to the out-going HTTP header.

value.span: 当 ASP.NET 输出缓存随 标头而变化并将该标头添加到被发送到客户端的 HTTP 标头时，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when ASP.NET output cache varies by the header and adds it to the HTTP header sent to the client; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器用来确定对客户端请求响应中发送的其中多个缓存响应的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. `Accept-Language`字段指定服务器选择基于语言可接受的客户端的响应。The `Accept-Language` field specifies that the server selects the response based on languages acceptable to the client. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行一些操作仅当属性是`true`。The following code example demonstrates how some action is performed only if the property is `true`. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCacheVaryByHeaders.UserLanguage Example/vb/source.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VaryByUnspecifiedParameters() cil managed

summary.span: 导致 ASP.NET 随所有标头值而变化，并将 HTTP 标头设置为值 \*（星号）。

span.span: Causes ASP.NET to vary by all header values and sets the HTTP header to the value \* (an asterisk).

summary.span: 所有其他 标头信息将被丢弃。

span.span: All other header information to be dropped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Vary`标头指示服务器用来确定对客户端请求响应中发送的其中多个缓存响应的请求标头字段。The `Vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses is sent in response to a client request. \* 值指定服务器选择基于未在请求标头 （例如，客户端的网络地址） 中指定的参数的响应。The \* value specifies that the server selects the response based on parameters not specified in request headers (for example, the network address of the client). 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details.
